name: A Frog's Journey
description:
Submission for 8bits to Infinity Time Jam

WARNING THIS IS A RAGE GAME, THIS GAME WILL CRUSH YOUR SOUL

Just jump up

CONTROLS

ARROW KEYS - Move

HOLD SPACE BAR - Charge Jump

R - Restart Game

CREDITS
